de.humatic.nmj

Class NetworkMidiOutput

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.humatic.nmj.NetworkMidiPort
      • de.humatic.nmj.NetworkMidiOutput

  • public class NetworkMidiOutput
extends NetworkMidiPort
    This class represents a MIDI output port. To get a NetworkMidiOutput instance call openOutput on the NetworkMidiSystem.

      • close

        public void close(NetworkMidiClient nmc)
        Description copied from class: NetworkMidiPort
        Close this port and releases resources that may have been acquired
        Overrides:
        close in class NetworkMidiPort

      • sendMidi

        public void sendMidi(byte[] data)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Send MIDI message(s) over this port. This will operate on the thread it is called from. It's in the application's responsibility to provide valid MIDI data here.
        Parameters:
        data - - valid MIDI data, possibly containing multiple messages and possibly making use of running status.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • sendMidi

        @Deprecated
public void sendMidi(byte[][] data)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Deprecated. 
        Send multiple MIDI messages over this port. It's in the application's responsibility to provide valid MIDI data here. Deprecated as of 0.89. Pass concatenated data to the one-dimensional array version of this method instead.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • sendMidiOnThread

        public void sendMidiOnThread(byte[] data)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Send MIDI on an internal worker thread. This is a quick way to stir around Android's NetworkOnMainThread aversion.
        Parameters:
        data - - valid MIDI data, possibly containing multiple messages and possibly making use of running status.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
